We use strictly necessary cookies for this website to function, we do have other optional cookies, which you can enable and descriptions of these are available beside the opt in buttons. To find out further information on our cookies, please see our Privacy and Cookie Policy.

You will find below the different types of cookies used on LG.com. If you wish to allow any of these cookies, click to opt in.

  1. Functional Cookies
    Enable for useful website features like product reviews, the where to buy function, recently viewed items and search data.
  2. Social media
    Connect with your social channels to share LG Technology with friends for example on Facebook and Twitter.
  3. Website analysis
    Help us to understand your behaviour on our website so we can improve the content and personalise your experience on LG.COM
  4. Advertising and
    targeting cookies
    Allow us to gather information about how you interact with our advertising and our website.

SELF-LIT PiXELS
make cinema more expressive

01

SELF-LIT PiXELS
make every scene feel real

Backlight bleed on LED TVs can cause you to miss hidden details within a scene.
Whereas LG OLED TVs have individual self-lit pixels that create infinite contrast and Perfect Black.
This lets you see every color, detail, and texture, even in dark battle scenes.

Learn more about the SELF-LIT OLED

SELF-LIT LG OLED

BACKLIT LCD/LED

*Screen images simulated.

Hollywood has much to say

Rob Legato & Tim Miller Hollywood filmmakers

"The infinite contrast,
it just pops off the frame.
It's perfect."

02

SELF-LIT PiXELS
take 8K to new levels

REAL 8K adds such believable texture to every scene that it feels like the actors are
performing right in front of you. This is achieved by more than 100 million self-lit subpixels*
that bring every single detail to life on a huge 88-inch screen — even at wide angles.

Learn more about REAL 8K

*Calculation based on multiplying 8K resolution (7680x4320) and four sub-pixels.

  1. ZX 88,77 inch
  2. ZX 88,77 inch
  3. ZX 88 inch
  4. ZX 77 inch
03

SELF-LIT PiXELS
empower studio quality

The infinite contrast of self-lit pixels is the perfect match with the most
advanced HDR solution, Dolby Vision IQ, the latest upgrade from Dolby Vision.
LG OLED TVs — together with the intelligent Dolby Vision IQ — deliver uniform
brightness and sharpness, regardless of the ambient environment or content genre. This is combined with Dolby Atmos, the object-based surround sound system
that transforms your space and redefines your audio experience.

*Dolby, Dolby Atmos and the double-D symbol are registered trademarks of Dolby Laboratories.

Content as the director intended

LG OLED TVs now feature the all-new FILMMAKER MODE™.
This disables effects like motion smoothing and image sharpening, and preserves
original aspect ratios, colors, and frame rates to more closely match the vision of the director.
It's easily activated through the TV menu, or by simple voice command using the magic remote.

Christopher Nolan Hollywood Filmmaker The Dark Knight, Interstellar, Dunkirk

"...We can ensure the original
intent of the filmmaker."

*FILMMAKER MODE™ logo is a trademark of UHD Aliance, Inc.

04

Every genre is at its best

Our most advanced a9 Gen3 AI Processor ensures that self-lit pixels
display the most original, awe-inspiring picture quality for every genre. The a9 Gen3 AI Processor analyzes millions of data sets based on
deep-learning algorithms to detect genre and enhance picture quality.
It also optimizes audio by genre, voice, effect, and frequency.

05

Your favorites
are in one place

Enjoy all your favorite content from Netflix, Disney+, the Apple TV app, and LG Channels.
The latest movies, TV shows, documentaries, live sports and more are now
accessible through voice commands without needing to use the remote.

“Hi, LG. Launch Disney Plus.”

  1. *Disney+ subscription required. Subject to terms at https://www.disneyplus.com© 2020 Disney and its related entities.

  2. *Watch Apple TV+ with a subscription.

*Supported content(Disney +, Apple TV+, Netflix) and services may vary depending on the country.
*Voice Command/Hands-free control function availability may vary across products and platforms.

06

The ideal cinema
is at your command

A simple request to LG OLED TVs can change the mood of a room into your perfect home cinema.
In addition to general voice commands, you can create customized commands like, "Movie night".
Once set up, you can easily access connected devices and control home appliances through
the intuitive Home Dashboard and built-in intelligence — LG ThinQ.

“Hi, LG. Movie night.”

Learn more about

*Available functions may vary depending on the country and products. *Voice Command availability may vary by products and countries. *Hands-free control is supported on LG OLED RX, ZX, WX, GX models.

07

SELF-LIT PiXELS
let you watch in comfort

LG OLED TVs surpass industry standards for blue light, flicker, and high-quality imaging.
So now you can watch your favorite content with less blue light and easy viewing.

  1. Eye Comfort Display (OLED)
    www.tuv.com
    ID : 0235004971
  2. Low Blue Light Display (OLED)
    50% Below Exempt
    Blue Light Risk Group Limit

*UL Verified Mark is certified for LG OLED 65RX, 77ZX, 65WX, 77/65/55 GX, 77/65/55 CX, 77/65/55 BX.
*LG OLED 65RX, 77ZX, 65WX, 77/65/55 GX, 77/65/55 CX, 77/65/55 BX received an Eye Comfort Display certification from TUV Rheinland.

08

Real surround sound
for a big theater mood

Bluetooth Surround Ready fully immerses you in a three-dimensional cinematic experience.
All you have to do is simply connect two identical Bluetooth speakers to your LG OLED TV.
Position them as rear speakers and they work together with the TV audio to
deliver a transformative big theater atmosphere.

*Connection with LG speakers is available now. Compatibility with other brand speakers will be available in early 2020 after a software update.
